long_description: A great fit for large faces, the SunCloud Ticket Polarized Sunglasses protect your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays as you tackle trails or set out on the water. Polarized lenses cut glare from water, snow and asphalt. Lenses also block 86% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Slip-resistant rubber nose pads become tacky when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. SunCloud Ticket Polarized Sunglasses best fit large faces. Closeout.
short_description: A great fit for large faces, the SunCloud Ticket Polarized Sunglasses protect your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays as you tackle trails or set out on the water.
